This is a cute little bougie place. I recommend for a find girls outing. They have good food and drinks and give a reason to get dressed cute.
Lovely place to get some macrons macrons macrons!! Definitely try their macrons, not too sweet just perfect, and their packaging is very cute too, great for giving out as gift too! Highly recommend
The desserts are super pretty and delicious especially all the Macrons are to die for and their wrapping are so beautiful! Highly recommend.
Stopped by and grabbed couple Macaroon to go. Did not try the food menu, but Macaroon was good, not too sweet and taste sooo good!

This is a nice restaurant to go to for work lunch or an outing with friends or family. Italian food here is delicious and fresh. However, the waiting time is pretty long but definitely worth the wait.
Excellent quality , very nice macarons , I loved it
Great place to go with friends and family. Loved it.

We go there all because the desserts, they are pretty that you want to take them all. But after tasting the food, we realize we cannot eat the dessert, becasue the food are amazing! Never getting wrong with the fried mushrooms. Crunchy outside but soft and juice BOOM in your mouth. Pizza is good as well. This lunch is worth for 20 mins waiting.If you cannot eat any dessert after the meal like us, you can take out.Packging is cute and good for gifting.

This restaurant is simply divine, me and my husband eat here quite often and I always come to get a salad and glass of wine with my sister Ruth when she is in town. I highly recommend the pizza as well if you're dinning with multiple people.
address: Downtown Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA

text: The Pizza and tiramisu I had in this place are worth every penny. The service is outstanding, and everything from the salad to the sweets are fresh and tasty.
Great Service and FoodThe pizza at this place is amazing, i would recommend this place to anyone
Great food and great service.  Everything we ordered was tasty/delicious.  Desserts were amazing.  Would definitely go back again!

From the hosts, to the servers and of course the food, everything is spectacular. When anyone asks me a place to go downtown for dinner, this is my "go-to" recommendation. The aesthetic is simple & beautiful (feels like your in NYC) and the amazing service makes me feel comfortable paying the price that it is.
First time here but love it. Desserts was delicious also service was good . I'll definitely be back

Really nice atmosphere with minimalistic decor. Extremely nice pizza made with fresh ingredients, thin crust, and good semi sweet blend sauce. But beware if wearing white the sauce can get a bit messy. Good hearty salads also with fresh ingredients. The environment is very welcoming with great and helpful staff.
Macrons O' macrons. I can visit this place everyday, and have their macrons for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. They are that good!
legit the best food and the most considerate staff. Amazing food and worth the price
Thanks to Frankie @ The lobster restaurant highly recommended BL.  We enjoyed our visit.  Food is amazing.

As a sweet tooth, I can never stop myself from picking up their delicate macarons or just a simple pick-me-up like their chocolate and sprinkle covered pretzels. Their cakes are also just so. damn. good.

This place is so grand and chic. Service is always outstanding.I've been here twice and so far everything is delish. I love all the details here. You can watch the cooks cooking. The patisserie counter is lovely. With so many options to choose from. When I'm here I feel like I'm in heaven but with cocktails!
Romantic vibes! And beautiful architecture!Brought my wife here for dinner and we had one of the best dinners.Also, dessert was so delicious!
If your in Downtown Los Angeles , this is a MUST! Pizza's are sublime, you will not be disappointed at all.
A feast for the eyes and taste buds.
Beautiful Place! Great vibe and really good eats!

I love this place!  it is loud, high energy, and very urban.  from the little bar off the side to the pasties and the pizza oven, all offerings are scrumptious.  Tartufo and Calabrese pizzas are my two favorites as well as Steak Frites.  Definitely a DTLA staple and a must visit for anyone who has not!
Has some of the best lamb! I am not a fan of lamb but the way they make it taste is honestly so awesome!! Thanks for changing my mind on lamb! So good!
They have an amazing vibe and the wine is plentiful

Loved it! And boy was it busy. I am talking 9:30ish and it was packed! We ordered 1/2 margharetia and 1/2 burrata pizza and i loved the margharetia one more than the burrata but thats prob because i didnt realize it would be so cheesy.GO TO THIS PLACE
Very busy, but worth it! Just went for the first time this past week and the entire staff was outstanding, and the food was spectacular! Will definitely come back!
Excelente restaurant, the service and the food its just world class!
One of the best places in LA even if you are in town just overnight you have to make some time and come by and eat here its amazing!
Great place I like to go to after work sometimes for a nice glass of wine and chill vibe. Close by in the heart of downtown. Definitely worth a try.
First time here and they have an amazing selection of deserts , The macaroons were good
Fantastic pastries and they're pizza is pretty good too.
Never disappointed at this place , good food, good vibe , good service . A perfect girl night out for a birthday party .
Beautiful location! Everything is delish! Always a great time.
Love bringing my guests here for that wow factor. Something neat you don't find anywhere else except in NYC.

When I look for a new restaurant to try, my two most important things are ambiance and food quality. The food was great, but the ambiance was beyond. I came here with my boyfriend after spending a day at the Natural History Museum. The decor was so cute, and we got seated right away. I even took some desserts to go because they were beautiful!

You want macaroons? Then this is a MUST TRY!!!! I love to stop by and get my craving satisfied every time. They have so many options. The only negative is the lines...It can sometimes be very long but the wait is worth it!
amazing and well worth the money. Bit noisy
Everything on the menu is yummy. I wish they would allow reservations to be called in. A wait time is hit or miss.
Upscale spot in Downtown. Good food, deserts, and service!

Love dining at this restaurant! Always like how the servers are very polite. Their macrons are also a lovely delight to eat as a dessert after the main course. Their pasta are to die for! Might make every Sunday a Bottega Louie ritual and eat out here with my family.

We got the friendliest staff ever. We got into an issue with another customer while dining and our waitress and manager made sure we were safe and having a nice time the whole time. They even kind of escort us out when we left to make sure we were safe in our Uber. I'm so sad I don't remember our waitress' name because she was so good to pick up the hints when we were stuck in an unsafe situation and kept checking on us. Even the manager kept coming to our table and even though she didn't have to, she kept apologizing to us for having such issue which we appreciate and let us know how amazing they are. Aside from that note, food was DELICIOUS! We had the Calabrese pizza, lasagna and the Trenne pasta and were probably the best decisions I have ever done lol Ambiance was super fun, such an LA vibe.

Hate the long lines here, but the truth is, the food is really good. The service is also top notch.  Staff is really nice and the mushroom fries or whatever are amazing. I just don't go very often becuase its alwas so packed.
Best lasagna ever!!!! Love this place! If you don't like big to wait don't come. It's always completely packed and at times the space is kind of tight but I still love it.
Best macaroons in the are. I highly recommend it
if you have a sweet here come for the best treats!

I ordered a box of macarons to be delivered to my best friend for her birthday. Absolutely wonderful experience. They did an amazing job wrapping it with a bow and made sure the macarons were fresh and beautifully placed. I had it sent via UberEats because the lady told me that their other courier service shipping costs start at $30 and it's much better to do it through UberEats. Such a nice thing to let me know since they could have just said $30 and pocketed it. Sophie from their office was super helpful!

Nice desert and tea place. Food not so much. Very nice and cute atmosphere, felt almost like i was in France. The parking can be hectic. Make sure your eclairs and macaroons. Worth going all the way to downtown for.
Great place to stumble on, especially on a sunny day!
Wonderful place. A bit noisy to my taste, but this is the trend now. Great food and great service more than make up for that!
Love the desserts! Open concept kitchen is cool.
dfffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
ggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggg
im like love yor foooooooooddddd!!!!!!!
Restaurant is very nice and beautifully designed. Ordered a specialty pizza and it was amazing.
Beautiful Restaurant! Love the Brunch! I wish I could have the lemon ricotta pancakes every weekend:)
Great taste, amazing place to visit and bring out of towners.
We come every year on the business trip, what a great place food is excellent.

While this review specifically pertains only to the macarons, I feel obligated to say something because of how fantastic they were. I tried the salted caramel, raspberry, and birthday cake macarons. While the birthday cake macaron wasn't anything too special, the salted caramel and raspberry were absolutely phenomenal. All the "melt in your mouth" "perfect balance of sweet and creamy" stuff you hear. Yeah. It's all true. The consistency of the cookies are wonderful and the raspberry definitely ranks the highest of all macarons I've had.  I'll definitely be back for the macarons. Also--parking, it's downtown, so metered street parking and lots with a bit of a walk are your best bet
Awesome lace I love it here so much! Please check it out 100 100 1000 super awesome experience totally enjoyed it

Interior is great! Set up is spacious and hip. I've only tried their tarts (pretty good and very pretty looking), bran muffins (a little more raisins please and spice??), coffee (fairly good beans), mustard potato salad (GROSS and the potatoes weren't cooked), and curry chicken salad (very good). Great location as well, near the Metro and jewelry and fashion districts. Overall, I really like this place but the cashiers are SLOW...then again, it is a new place and they haven't yet got their groove yet! :) I'm hopeful! Cannot wait to try their menu the prices aren't bad.

This is a good time  for  games  and get togethers for all Family and Freinds that you care for people to do w my funds that belong in the art of living foundation and the national security  teams  because they have a Nation
Pizza and desert is great. Check it out if you can.
super cute place. I loved the macaroons!
Amazing gluten free pastries. It's located right next to one of my hang out spots in Downtown LA, The Nomad Hotel. It's an elegant restaurant with attentive service.
Great pizza and the chicken is really farm raised.
What is a really good here but nobody famous is here. I love to eat there. But I really would like to see more celebrities.
The very best place to get macarons in the city! And cutest!
really loud but great for lunch!!!
Love this restaurant, haven't found a dish I didn't like yet...been here since opening

It is not a surprise at all that Bottega Louie is a true LA institution. The dessert spread is simply legendary and I have not seen anything like it. It gets crowded, so you may want to call early to avoid disappointment.
Their food and menu is really good in general. They also provide great service. They have an amazing soufflé dessert dish. Try it out!!
The cakes are SO FLUFFY and delicious! Would recommend! - Cherry
Great restaurant and awesome food!
They have the cutest patisseee and macaroon shop. Take some beautiful pastry to go! Their bags are to boot.

Bottega Louie is one of my favorite eateries downtown.  I love the ambiance.  Chic mixed with a little bit of hustle and bustle. The food Is delicious and prepared fresh in front of customers in pretty much an open kitchen.  The menus is pretty great.  Kind of a French, American and Italian fusion.  The bar has great signature drinks, and the bakery has some amazing treats.  I love the macaroons and the madeleines and the tarts.  Amazing amazing amazing.  There is also a cute little French store inside where one can buy drinks and chocolates and other really cute things to eat.  When I lived close to this place I would eat there at least a couple of times a

Everything's superb in this restaurant. From the quality of their services and foods, my first visit was nothing but full of praises and astonishment. I loved how they made well-designed decorations for their facilities. The ambiance it generates is not too classy nor too casual, it's homey and coming to it feels so cozy and comfortable. Great place upraises the great cuisines and great services. I just wish they will get all the love they deserve!
Great place to eat and enhoy a nice snack
Simply outstanding.  Need I say more?
Love it for brunch - good food - busy and fun!!!
Always a great dinning experience , I recommended trying the duck and wine list.
delicous! wonderful atmosphere! love, love, love!
Food and atmosphere is great, parking is a struggle.
I love this place because it stays open late. The pizza is so good you need to try it. Also you cannot leave without trying the macrons. The only thing it is a first come first served basis.
Must try the portabello fries!!! and anything in the bakery is to die for!
address: South Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA

text: Great restaurant. A lot of people but line moves quick so don't be discouraged. Great bakery if you want to grab and go. Otherwise put your name on the list and wait. The food has never disappointed.
loud but the food and service is incredible
In love with the placePricey but I love the ambiance and decorations here and the service is awesome
This place is SO good!  Love coming here when I get the chance.
Great place. When the first time I went there, it is so fancy and amazing. The dessert is very good and tasty. will repeat for sure.
Their service, food, aesthetic is soooo good!
This is the best place to get cakes! Brunch crowd is a bit busy. They need a better system to get to-go orders, but aside from that, it's a great place. Great service.
What can I say about this place that hasnt been said a hundred times over? Probably nothing- this place gets 110% score from me. GO HERE!!!
Still a go to place. Great food and service
perfect!!!!! we love it. fast and deloicious

Read all the yelps reviews and decided to check out Bottega Louie. A beautiful, comfortable, and friendly atmosphere with the most amazing authentic Italian food! The prices are reasonable and fast service as well. I will definitely be back.
Great service and food. I love this place
Excellent service! I was treated with upmost respect by the staff. The food is amazing here.
address: South Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA

text: Nothing really to be said other than the price points this place is perfect love it love it love it. If you can afford it. Baked goods are ridiculously tasty. If you're visiting LA it's a must stop.
Great food and bakery goodies..Only issue is it is LOUD, hard to hear who you are with talk.
The Princess cake which is gluten free is the best desert from the bakery there. You have to try if you haven't become addicted already, lol. Incredible selection of deserts and good restaurant too..
I love BL! Pizza and Macaroons what more can you ask for?Staff is delightful very resourceful when indecisive!

Excellent place with great atmosphere and well made food, bar staff is super nice and if you wish to avoid the sometimes long waiting than you should consider having dinner at the bar , amazing deserts

Exquisite place. Friendly employees. The princess cake is a true delight for chocolate lovers. The milk chocolate mouse smoothly melts on your tongue and goes well with the dark chocolate coat. Hidden surprise on the bottom is a red velvet macaroon. The latte is deliciously milky, no need for sweetener. The pastries and coffee lives up to the fancy prices. I'm sure the lunch / dinner cuisine will too.
this place is wonderful and lovelyi went here with my love and he loved itSee you later guys!

I went here a while back as a first timer, very busy restaurant, reasonable priced food and they can still maintain the high level of service, very impressive. I ordered their pork chop as my entree and it's very juicy and perfectly done. Service is great considering the restaurant is super busy, very attentive and friendly service.

I LOVE Bottega Louie.  I'm usually there at least 3 times a week.  The pizza is my absolute favorite.  The crust is absolutely amazing, and the desserts, forget about it.  They're dangerously delicious.

I came here for NYE two years ago with my husband, my sister, and my brother-in-law. Not just delicious, but beautiful, food, in a setting that successfully combines whimsy with elegance. Such a memorable evening!
had the best bread very long line.
One of my favorite brunch spots. Everything I have tried is really good! The desserts are amazing!!
Great environment and newer place that is very good quality food and wine.
I can't remember when I have had such delicious food. Thanks Louie.

Awesome experience! Really friendly staff, spacious, clean, and the pizza was bomb. My girlfriend and I ordered just one and it was more than enough. $25 for a gourmet pizza for two at a nice restaurant is not bad at all. Didn't have any of the pastries this time, but they looked amazing in the display! Next time.

Awesome experience! Really friendly staff, spacious, clean, and the pizza was bomb. My girlfriend and I ordered just one and it was more than enough. $25 for a gourmet pizza for two at a nice restaurant is not bad at all. Didn't have any of the pastries this time, but they looked amazing in the display! Next time for sure

Always close quarters and loud in here, but the beignets and macaroons are always 100% worth it! Absolutely give the crispy pasta (tetrazzini?) with short rib a try, it's phenomenal. Bring back the butterscotch budino!
I ordered me one of them waffles, and boy were they good!
This place is great and it keeps getting better. The menu has a great selection of dishes. Get here early because it fills up quick! I highly recommend.
Muy buen restaurante delicioso, y servicio rápido y atento. Un ambiente agradable con comida y postres deliciosos muy recomendable!!!!
I like this place, its wonderful, the whole set up.
I came here for dinner and had the Bottega Louie Pep Pizza. Very delicious!
Amazing place!  That's all I have to say!  AHHHH MAZE ZING!  Since I'm speechless and have to yield to yelp's minimum amount of words to type, this is just so I can meet the minimum.  AMAZING!!!
Pesto Gnocchi! The service was great. The food was delicious. Everything was perfect.
I love the food here!​ its phenomenal and all the food is mouthwatering​ in a good way! Such great service as well!
A new favorite. The service is spectacular and the ​staff is considerate. On top of that, the food is so amazing. I strongly recommend coming here and trying!
Love this place!!! Very friendly and always willing to give you suggestions on what to order.
Their food was amazingly good except for the fact when you order raviolis and they're only one medium sized one on your plate. The macrons are delicious.
Amazing environment and better food!
For what you get--outstanding food and great service--Bottega Louie is a bargain compared to some other joints downtown.  Breakfast is my favorite here.
I love the macaroons here. This place has great food, turns into a bar at night, and during the day everyone loves it. Clear windows, great sun light. Good vibes. Food is very good.
wow! the place was really amazing!! the food was so good! specially macaron itried was so far good!!
A place for great food and dessertThis is a busy place in DTLA. Everything is great, the pizza is made and bake before your eyes. Very comfy seating and nice decor. Lots of beautiful dessert!
Bottega Louie makes the absolute best macaroons in the world. I love them so much I order them online and ship them to FL. Packaging is super cute also. Also a great place for the 'gram.
This is probably my favorite spot in LA. Great service, delicious food.The macaroons are a plus AMAZING!!!

The restaurant is loud and crowded, but good makes it well worth it.  I will definitely come back. But I couldn't hear any of my friends except for the ones sitting right next to me. Great for dates, and celebrations. Recommend.
Awesome place. Love the food and the drinks. They make the best Manhattan! Try it!
Hands down the best sweets I've ever tried.A must if you are visiting down town LA.
The pizza here is amazing. It gets loud when its crowded! but hands down I will be going back!
Great food, Great service, Great staff!
Fun, delicious, vibrant and exiting
Best of the best ~ so great, fresh and best service!
Bottega Louie is one of my family's favorite brunch spots in LA!The service is always great, the food is always great and you can't beat the location!!
The lasagna is my favorite. ...and of course, make sure you get some macaroons. Yum.
If you love Italian cuisine. You MUST come to try this restaurant. Everything from A-Z is amazing!
treat yourself to this otherwordly experience! incredible macarons and delish food.

Great Brunch spot. It's also pretty crowded all the times. If you decide on this place for dinner, you should try their Bologna's pasta. I believe it's a blend of different types of meat they use, so the pasta has an amazing flavor.
Great restaurant. A lot of people but line moves quick so don't be discouraged. Great bakery if you want to grab and go. Otherwise put your name on the list and wait. The food has never disappointed.

Where else can you go downtown to buy a little bit of heaven? There are over 20 flavors of deliciously delightful macaroons at $2.50 a piece which come with a beautiful decorated box that holds five. But which five did I choose? I love the mint, espresso, raspberry, and bananas Foster,  vanilla seems a little bland probably because I ate the Bolder flavors first. It wasn't the first time I purchased them so I'm guilty of choosing them more than once. Anyways it's in downtown LA and it's one place where you can purchase beautiful treats and desserts like cakes and beignets. The staff is attentive and kind  enough to package my purchase in a gorgeous box that was beautiful.
The best food in downtown . great choice
Great restaurant, food, staff and atmosphere. Went for a graduation lunch, couldn't have been better!  Thanks Bottega Louies
Love the food and atmosphere. Can be loud at times, but still 5 stars

This is probably my favorite restaurant in all of LA, a must dine place if you're visiting in town. They have another location coming hopefully soon to the West Hollywood area, although construction is taking longer than I expected. I've had nearly everything on the menu so you're in for a treat!

Love this place, service is always what it should be for the price point. The small plates are always great. A wonderful fine dining experience. The ambience was very swanky,  the staff was attentive and the food mouthwatering. Great Job Bottega Louie..
omg so good. go here with my gfs every month,
Amazing place for dessert! Everything is so good and the environment is elegant.Came here for tea time.Highly recommend.
Amazing. Delicious. Pricey but worth it.
Had a beautiful lunch with friends here. We tried a lot of things today. All amazing!Can't wait to come back.
The food is amazing as well as the atmosphere. it is worth every dime
Nothing like their macaroons! Love coming to this place, perfect for brunch! Will be back soon!
Get the Margherita Pizza PERIODAnd anything from their pastry side of the restaurant.
Love the elegance and space this beautiful oasis high ceilings with very fair prices. Recommend eating on a date very romantic and bossy and not to expensive
This place is really fun, loud and busy.  If your looking for a place to go hang and enjoy with some friends and not care about noise but have some nice dessert after, then this place is for you!
I really enjoyed the food and service here.  Would recommend coming here for a special dinner or having a private party.

loved this place it was great. the restaurant is big and open, lots of natural lighting. Definitely enjoyed the pizza and seeing the go in and out of the ovens. My son also had some delicious macaroons.
Always a great experience at this DTLA staple.

The macaroons were great! The pizza was good too! Our server was fast. He made sure we were well seated and that we had a good time. It is packed most of the time but gladly when we were there, it wasn't.
Had there wild salmon ! BAM it was a grand slam . The service was great too . Recommend if your down town LA .
Five stars! Great atmosphere, food and service. Came for lunch and was not disappointed. I highly recommend this company. I love it!
best restaurant Italian pizza great coffee   very big selection menu I'm highly recommended to com and try this amazing place!! customer service was amazing !
Wish I lived closer so I could go all the time! My favorite part is taking macaroons home and sharing them with family.
This place has the best macaroons I have ever tasted in my life. So much flavor and very beautiful
ALWAYS an amazing experience.  Beautiful environment, yummy pastries and delicious food...great service!
pretty great ambiance and food!
Fantastic place! Delicious food and fun!
This is a must visit place. Whenever I'm in LA I definitely visit to try mashed potato with truffle and chocolate ganache. Love the ambience and fun energy of this place.

This place rocks! I recently moved to DTLA and this is now my go to place. It's a tad expensive, but their food is so good so it's worth it. My favorite item is the chicken salad. Very basic but so tasty! They're usually packed so make sure you call and get a reservation or just don't walk in around dinnertime. I highly recommend this place though!

This place has an amazing restaurant area but the bakery is what I am specifically writing about. I have yet to find a better place in LA to get macaroons. They provide customizable boxes and even have Macaroon cakes. I got one for my boyfriend for Valentines Day. Now we can't go downtown without stopping in!
Great Service, Food and Ambience!  Wish you would open one in the San Fernando Valley!
I love this place. It is open and airy and the smell of sweet delights fills the air. The chocolate souffle is a must! It is so rich and creamy...a true decadent treat.
Gorgeous decor, delicious food, amazing desserts. Definitely a splurge , great place for a date.

Would like to take this chance to say thanks to your restaurant. The fantastic service you have given to us was like a breath of fresh air. The staff who served us was very fantastic, friendly, professional and certainly awesome. They made it easier for us to decide what to order. I highly recommend your restaurant to our friends and family. Your dedication in your work must others should learn from you. The luxusrious look of the place made it even more fantastic

Great food and excellent service! Went around dinner time with my girls and I enjoyed the lively atmosphere. Great drinks and great food! Our server was very attentive and informed on the menu. Will be back again!

It's so good, especially the salads. And the pastries. The only downsides are that there wasn't any music playing each time I've been and the prices are steep. But overall, definitely a great place in the prime of DTLA.

I heard about this place so many times and was so anxious to try their food. My husband and I shared pepperoni pizza and portobello fries. Their pizza was nice and crisp, but we actually enjoyed the mushroom fries more. For dessert, we grabbed some donuts on our way out which was amazing!
good you ask???HELL YES.It is so the spot. Totally awesome service and SCRUMPTIOUS.

Macaroons are the best here.  There is such a big variety as well as other desserts.  We love the appetizers and pizza and it's always busy.  You can order appetizers and drinks while you wait.  The interior is very cool.
I can only speak on the desserts here but MAN were they good!! I ordered a box of macaroons and my friends ordered small cakes. We all left happy as could be!!
Great place, great attitude from the each member of staff. Gere you can be completely free and relaxed. Thw blackberyy pie is amazing!
Love this place.  great food and desserts
If you know me you know I love everything food and man is this place good.
I always like dressing up for this place.  I get my nails done at Nail salon around the corner and come here for mimosas or vice versa.
One of the best places I went to in a long time. highly recommended.

The moment you walk in you feel special, the decor is PERFECTION. We were pleasantly surprised to find the food was excellent! This place is style AND substance. Definitely recommend the portobello fries, and the arugula salad - don't forget to get some macarons to go.
the place to be !%100 high quality food if you in the area check this pace out .check this place u dont wont regret...go visit there .
The waiters are really nice and the service is great. Nice and private to take someone on a first date.

Bottega Louie caught my eye as I was planning our trip to LA. I cannot say enough about the staff and food!! Our server Carlos was personable and very attentive. Everyone I came across wished me a happy birthday. The food!! Our boys ordered the Margherita Pizza. My husband ordered the Claims Linguine and I ordered the Trenne. We each agreed that everything was delicious. For dessert I had we ordered Macaroons, Mint Chip Gelato, and Hazelnut Napoleon. We will definitely be going back the next time we are in LA.
too noisy inside.    everything else is excellent.
The best pizza I've had in a while!
Favorite place to pick up macarons and dessert.Even though it's normally super busy & packed, service is great!Their portabella mushroom fries are super delicious, must try.
Love the pizza here!! The margarita pizza and the red pepper arugula pizza is just AMAZING!

Simply the best! If you are thinking about going here, stop thinking and just go! We have eaten here at least 6 times. The food is ALWAYS excellent and the staff is really top notch. They must use the best ingredients because even a simple Caesar salad is out of this world amazing. Tip: order the chocolate soufflé for desert and let your server know ahead of time because it takes about 20 minutes to cook...it's incredible! Also love their pizzas, pasta and salads.
Delicious desserts.  There portobello fries are bomb.  They also have amazing flat breads.
Simply wonderful!! I love this place!
Their desserts are amazing loved everyone.  The macaroons are full of flavor but not too much.
The yummiest cakes in my life I tried here. Omg so fresh and so delish I couldn't help but say bye to my diet!
Great restaurant! Love the food and atmosphere!! Have a lot of seating and can get you in right away!
I love coming to Bottega Louie.  The space itself is worth coming to see.
WOW,  I was visiting Los Angeles and found this gem.  Service was great and the food was out of this world.  CHICKEN PARM ME!   Save room for desert because they are delicious.
RatingWoohoo! As good as it gets
all I have to say is..., BEST MACAROONS IN LA!! The food is top notch, beautiful atmosphere, a winner all the way around! but god... This Macaroons!!!!!!!
Was recommended this place while in town for a bit. Love love love the food. Want to go back and get more!
It's like a trip to Paris without the ten hour plane ride.
Love this place. Heard amazing things and tried it for the first time and loved it.

Spending this afternoon reviewing my favorite spots... This one I hold dear to me.. Lovely macarons.. Lovely tomato soup... Heavenly atmosphere, although a bit loud at times. . But I am forgiving because of those darn pastries and that friendly staff.. .

I have some coffee and sweets here the other day, I am staying in a hotel across the street. The place took my attention when I was walking by. i don't know, it looked so classy, fancy, one of those places where you see two generations sharing a tea pot while wearing white gloves. I know it may sound silly, but I had a lot of fun. The server was really funny, knowledgeable and well groomed. I enjoy my time. Way better that the nomad. At least I had some kind of nice adventure on this trip.
Bottega Louie is wonderful for a group. It's so loud but worth it. The food is great and the energy is vibrant.The bakery is amazing. I go sometimes just to grab  some sweets.

I  have to admit that the first time I came here, two years ago, I honestly was not all that impressed. I came here again mainly to grab some for my friend who wanted to try it, but never got a chance to. I grabbed myself two extra pieces for myself and wow.  I got the earl grey and mango and they were so so good.  I have to admit that it is definitely up there with Ladurée.    I was a little disappointed in myself that I didn't get more!  They have plenty of other desserts as well as a sit down restaurant.  I've never tried any of the other things, but hopefully I'll have a chance next time we come.
Great food, a little too busy at night time for my taste. I would recommend going for lunch or breakfast!

LOVE the food here, as every dish we tried was better than the last. Didn't have room for dessert, but with their bakery counter I'll be sure to stop by sometime soon. We sat at the bar (with surprisingly slow drink service), and got adequate service. Not too invasive, (I had to ask about the specials and signature items), but you will be well taken care of none the less. The place is neither quiet, nor cozy but definitely elevated in decor and atmosphere.

Delicious and yummy food for sure!!!The macarons are absolutely amazing.The pasta is delicious.The atmosphere is great.It can get crowded during the weekends for sure but I try to go during the non-busy hours if i can.
I love coming here for the macarons!!! They are absolutely delicious!!Parking sucks but that's what DTLA is known for anyways.
Great foodI love the macarons and the dining room is magnificent!
Love the portabella fires and the benets.
such great place and so many sweets to choose from!!
If you have anything bad to say about this place, you clearly have no taste. Seriously, this is the best place. Love it.
Just loooove this place! A must when visiting the city of angels... I have never been disappointed in any of the many visits I have had!

Tasty desserts and delicious entrees. The service is top quality. Eric attended us with grace and checked in on us respectfully and regularly. The presentation of the restaurant is always A+. 5 star for sure!
Everything in there was so cute and Instagram worthy!
The one pizza with special flavor. Service eis on top notch as always. Brilliant quality and really fast service.
If you're going to splurge this is the place to do it! Ridiculously delicious and amazing service.

Bottega Louis' lasagna is delicious! Service is great! The whole atmosphere is awesome! I like little bakery area where you can buy customized cakes and pastries. Everything looks so yummy in that bakery corner!!! They also have a bar where you can have a drink) I also like high ceiling design. So totally my favorite place to have lunch or dinner or just do a quick stop to grab a pastry!

Was here for new years eve with some family. Great service and great food. I enjoyed the vibe a lot. I ordered the popular Tartufo pizza and I would definitely order it again. For dessert everyone at my table had to try the macarons and I'm glad we did. I don't usually rave over macarons but these fit my palette nicely.I will be back for sure!
Excellent food and service.. delicious clam linguine and artichoke pizzaThe desserts are made to perfection.. my fav is the raspberry napoleon
BEST DESSERT EVER!Parking is valet.Mushroom fries is a must.European feel. Reminds me of a cafe in Paris.
Love this place! It's always wonderful to be there :)
Enjoyed the desserts here. A little pricey but i guess it was okay
LOVE LOVE LOVE it!!!!  Beautiful place in the center of DT LA
Such a beautiful and cute resturant. I feel like I am in paris every second of it LOL

I love Bottega Louie. Sunday morning brunch with a bloody mary is the best. Always easy to get a seat in the bar. The Pizza's are amazing, the service is always great. We have been to Bottega about 8-9 times now and every time it just gets better. I must say that the acoustics in the space are not that great, it is super load in the restaurant, I suppose that comes with the territory for a beautifully restored older downtown building. I feel like I am in Europe every time I am there. I suspect the parking may be a bit tight as it is prime downtown, we always Lyft to keep from dealing with parking. If you have not been it is must go location.
Great place, love everything about it. Wait time is a bit long but worth the time.
clean, yummy and amazing! what a gem!

The Spot. Who doesn't love Bottega Louie? One of the trendiest spot in downtown Los Angeles. You can't go wrong on a visit to Bottega Louie for brunch or dinner.  I recommend ordering a whole box of macaroons after your meal.
Absolutely love this place! Delicious and excellent service. Great atmosphere and beautiful bakery.The only think I didn't like was the decaf coffee.
I love this place. It's so cute & it's Downtown. We ALL love Downtown! Their hostess Stefany is amazing & their macaroons are EVERYTHING!

Most unique place in DTLA.  Reminds me of finding a spot like this in New York City.  Such a great spot to get gourmet desserts and treats as well as a kick butt meal!  The dining area is alive with energy and noise to make you feel excited when the food arrives.  Bravo!

I came here with my friends last night and I MUST say, this restaurant is like a dessert lovers' DREAM. Everything from the food to the drinks to the dessert was outstanding. I had heard a lot about this restaurant before coming and it lived up to all the good things I heard prior to eating here. This will be our girls lunch/dinner spot from now on.

Food was excellent. Coffee was great. Best part was our server Rachael. She consistently asked us how everything tasted each time she would bring out a course. Our drinks were always full and she would refill our water even though we had a bottle at the table. Can't wait to come back!
address: South Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA

text: Sexiest most elegant restaurant giving you Paris sidewalk cafe vibes.  Can't wait for West Hollywood to open!

This place is a gem in downtown LA!Incredible atmosphere, wait staff and food.  Oh and the desserts are out of this world. Date night dinner here made me very popular! We had their delicious pasta bolognese and a sausage mushroom pizza that is as good as it gets...

Love this place! It is seriously amazing the pizza is so good I feel it honestly doesn't receive as much attention as it should. Really nice place decor is also up to date. Only thing that sucks is the parking situation here. Take Lyft or Metro. 7th and Fig is fairly close so that's always good as well. Driving in downtown is a hassle and not worth the headache. They also have very good drinks.
I am not a macarons Fans. However, I love here. Everything except macarons.
Nothing bad to say at all. Very crowded but the food is soooo good and so fresh.Will definitely be back

Food was excellent. Coffee was great. Best part was our server Rachael. She consistently asked us how everything tasted each time she would bring out a course. Our drinks were always full and she would refill our water even though we had a bottle at the table. Can't wait to come back!

This place has the best dessert on the planet! I usually get the strawberry frasier (sp?)...OMG...so good. The portabello fries are to DIE FOR. Something you must try at least once in your life! Pizzas are great, as is the lasagna. The ONLY thing I don't like is the lack of parking.

Splendid Sunday BrunchFood was excellent: for starters we had the Beignets with Raspberry Compote and we had their Pepperoni Pizza, Avocado Toast with a side of bacon and Eggs Benedict and everything was absolutely delicous! The atmosphere was beautiful and relaxing, the food was delicious and the staff were enjoyable and kind. Would love to go back!

My favorite breakfast place in Los Angeles. I had the lobster hash and it was really good! My wife always has the eggs Benedict and loves them every-time. We bring macaroons home and everybody loves them.
fast service, great food, employees are very helpful come with friends im sure you will have a fantastic time!!! it was really great!!!come with people you love always a good time soooo good
I LOVE their macaroons! Especially Earl Grey and Raspberry. The place is more of a casual setting. Nice interior but loud. The food is okay but i usually go here for their macaroons and pastries.

Awesome eating with super affordable prices. The staff is hit or miss when it comes to good customer service. Overall it's a good eat for your money. Shareable plates and the menus is pretty expansive with options.

Bottega Louie is a place everyone needs to try at least once, even if it's a small dessert. This restaurant produces a plethora of extraordinary savors as I can attest. The place is located in central downtown, which is lovely and offers a soft, chic appearance to it. If you are interested in restaurants like this, I would recommend following yummylifestyles on Instagram.
Service was great, food was great, desserts were amazing and very nice place. Going back soon!
Elegant, tasteful atmosphere. Upscale ambiente and selected items on the menu plus a fill bar. Gets crowded quickly and rightfully so. Always glad to be there.
Love, love, love this place... great atmosphere and perfect place for girls brunch!!!
It was this beautiful restaurant and a great location I absolutely loved it and can't wait to go back.
I went before a couple time, I love this place, TARTUFO PIZZA is super delicious.Most Restaurant reviewed on yelp, beautiful design BEEF CARPACCIO as a appetizer is amazing

This is a review about their pies: they are amazing. Even though they are pretty pricey, the pies are delicious and make amazing gifts. Bring a large fruit tart or pumpkin pie from Bottega Louie around the holidays and you will be everyone's favorite house guest!

Bottega Louie can do no wrong!! Been here for din a bunch and it always slays, but came here for brunch last weekend and it was just as good as one would expect. I got the belgian waffle with a side of eggs over medium. Waffle was fluffy, fruit was fresh, they use REAL MAPLE SYRUP (don't accept anything less), and the whipped cream with the waffle was perfect. Another home run for B-Louie, obvi
Good dinner, good vibe, good service. The dessert is excellent there. Must leave some room for dessert.
The best place to get macaroons no one but no one comapres to their delicious treats.

came here with my girlfriend with her advice. both of us are cannot get on without sweet, so this place was a real treasure for us. She told me about eclairs, so I tasted one. they were miraculous. gonna visit here soon!
Love this place I'm never disappointed when I come here stop is fantastic the food is amazing!
Great service with awesome food.I work near this area and the food has been consistent.Thanks for such good service.I love the pizzas here! Yummy
best pizza in the USA ! and the desserts are amazing as well!

came here with my girlfriend with her advice. both of us are cannot get on without sweet, so this  place was a real treasure for us. She told me about eclairs, so I tasted one. they were miraculous. gonna visit here soon!
Too much to say, all I will tell you is JUST GO!And, their servers was an added plus....
love love love their chocolate princess cake!!!
The food, aesthetic, service and dessert were fantastic. I am definitely coming here again.
Love this spot! I used to buy macaroons in Paris, and can say that these ones are better than anything
This place is good would love to go back. It's clean and the people are very nice. Keep up the good work my favorite place

Fantastic food if you are able to wait.Though the wait is long, once you have been seated, the service is prompt and the food is excellent. Fresh Italian pizza made in front of your eyes. Make sure to save room for the exquisite dessert. They are known for their chocolate soufflé and their perfectly crafted macaroons. It is perfect for a night out with your significant other or even just dinner with your family. No matter what the occasion, Bottega Louie is the perfect restaurant option.
5 stars on the Bakery side! Everything looked so amazing but I settled on the Macarons after much pondering....all desserts looked amazing. Staff was very nice too!

We've been here couple of times for lunch & dinner and every time we left the place highly satisfied. Even though the noise level is very loud & most tables are really close to each other, we always had an excellent experience. Portobello mushroom fries is a MUST to have, so does the Black & Blue mojito and chocolate souffle. Can't wait to be back to Bottega Louie!
Macaroons galore! if heaven could be a place on earth, this would it.
The food and pastries are so good!
macaroons taste like they are straight from Paris!!!! love the earl grey one
great place a must go for sure if you ever visit LA
Those Macaroons are the best! Food is good. A bit busy at times but worth the wait.
Great food and amazing for lunch!
Macarons are simply delicious here! Huge selection and beautiful display. A little more on the expensive side but a good treat once in a while.
I come here for the atmosphere, the pizza, and the macaroons : )
I recently came here as part of a food tour group for the first time. The store is so beautiful; each piece of pastry and macaron is a work of art. So fancy. I feel like I'm in Paris.
Beautiful ambiance, great staff, and amazing food
Great food, cool location, friendly staff.
Absolutely gorgeous, the food here is amazing
awesome place! kids loved it, especially the fact that they could choose colors. it was a lot of fun!
All time favorite DTLA spot- gorgeous space full of air & light. Love sitting at the bar for a cocktail before dinner or popping in for coffee and over-indulging at the macaroon counter.
Delicious, great service. Only complain was that it was too loud. Pizza was very very good
Love, Love, Love this place!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

We went to Bottega Louie for their macaroons a few years back, but this time we dined at their restaurant. The three of us squeezed into a tiny table and ordered the Cobb Salad, Portobello fries and the Pomodoro. The Pomodoro pasta was so fresh and seasoned well, while the Cobb Salad arrived in a beautiful display of colors ranging from the red bacon, white eggs, green avocados and so on. We mixed the salad and it was delicious! The Portobello fries were tasty, but the aioli sauce made the appetizer worth it! Even though it's a bit touristy, this is still a place you must try. One of our all time favorites!
A-M-A-Z-I-N-G.Fantastic pateries, excellent (and super friendly) service!
Great restaurant. Food always good. Eaten here a few times and have never been disappointed. The lines can be long but you usually don't have to wait to long. Staff keeps tables moving.
Wonderful place. Yum. Excellent service. Good selection.

Super nice ambiance, well decorated elegantly like a French style bakery. It's not a real French bakery though but it works because it's very nicely presented and executed. I'll definitely told you to stop if you drove by to impress your guests at home with one of there desserts. Try out there tropezienne, saint honoré and banana crème tart you won't regret it!
the deserts are good even for a person who's lost all interest in the pleasures of a normal man

LOVE Bottega Louie!I frequent there for breakfasts & Brunches.Love the food, desserts, and LOVE their cappuccino's. I love all the waiters.  They have a way of making you feel like you're at home.Highly recommend them!

I found out about this place through Buzzfeed, of course, and I fell in love. The macaroons are to die for and the cakes are absolutely amazing, probably a little too pretty for me to eat. I'm defo planning on buying my birthday cakes from here.

Amazing service and amazing food~~Pomodoro served with very unique chewy type spaghetti. I loved it so much.Chocolate Souffle was not so sweet, irresistible, and tasty. Perfect balance of sweetness!Only bad thing about this place is the parking situation. But, I can still give them 5 stars for the quality food and service.
Pretty loud atmosphere but the food makes up for it (including desserts). The pizzas are great and the shrimp pasta is delicious. Get the butterscotch budino and the vanilla macaroons for dessert.
Such a great spot. Delicious food and very aesthetically pleasing.
lovely nice Italian bakery  its my first time and i loved that i will defenently coming back thank you
Good food, good service. Been here several times and will continue to go back.
Delicious!!!  The bakery is the best in LA!  My favorite is the St. honore desert.  Its out of this world.  You can't go wrong with anything there.
I love this super trendy place! Now I see why so many people post about it!
Like everyone has said, get the macarons. Don't be put off by the parking....it's the city.
amazinggggggggggg!!!! i loved my experience in general

this place is amazing. i had never had a macaron before till i visited this place. i will never accept a substitute for a macron. never truly understood what all the fuss was about but everything was great. i ordered the pomodoro and a vanilla soda along with pistachio and salted caramel macrons. highly recommended. will be back. :)
Love love love this place. Great gem in Downtown LA. Their pastries are insanely good.
Stunning restaurant! Interior is so great! This place is good and known for brunch and dessert. You must try their dessert!
one word delicious!

I use to live in downtown LA and moved earlier this year.   I still come to town like every other month and bottega louie was my go to spot before I moved and still never lets me down.   The trend pasta is my favorite.   And of course you can't beat the a amazing  desert selection.  And yes , the macaroons.  However I was a little disappointed they didn't have the birthday cake macaroons this past week.   But still always amazing.
I order for Thanksgiving - AMAZING!!!!
Love this spot!  Feels so NY in downtown LA!

They have fantastic desserts! Their French Macaroons or fruit tarts are making my tongue fall out even now 2 weeks after our visit (2 weeks already?! Have to go there soon again!).Moist, refreshing & mouth watering will sum it up!

Wow, this place is amazing. Everything here is divinely delicious. Pizzas are amazing especially the bolognese, and I never tasted so delicious grilled artichokes. Well I never ever tasted grilled artichokes ;) But their macaroons are out of this world. And the service is on-point.
Very glamorous! Amazing bakery items!

My wife always loves their macaroons here. Every event she had me pick up some of them on my way home.I cant blame, it really is good. I also pick up some whenever we have a misunderstanding - always lightens up her mood. haha
best place to go to brunch!! my boss loves it when
This place rocks, one of my favorite vibes in all of LA!!!!!!!!!!!
My favourite Bottega Louie cakes are Unique in design. Cakes are Light sponges and and baked fresh.  whenever I have ordered, I  got the same quality and their great taste.

The portabello fries are one of my favorite foods on the planet! The last time my mom was in town we ordered them to go and literally walked down the street eating them. DEfintely get the macaroons to nibble on later. I always go for the pistachio.

One of my favorites restaurants (along with the rest of the city!) They are extremely consistent, all their dishes are delicious, fresh, and reasonably portioned. They have excellent, WELL-trained, knowledgeable staff. There is generally a wait during evenings and weekends, but it's worth it. Their cocktails and desserts are tastey! A few fave dishes-- fried mushrooms with the dip!! and pizza with basil and red sauce. The chocolate cake is a great way to end the night if you have a sweet tooth.. they'll let you know if you have to order it with like 15 mins if prep time :)) enjoy!
This place is gorgeous! Try the salted macarons!
fantastic. A must do in LA. Great Pizza too..
thank you so much I love it is good place
Delicious.The best place I have been to. I just love this place, 10/10
very good service provider, i am getting goood services from here.

This is a great place to come for brunch. The food is great and the atmosphere pleasing. The pastries are super fresh. There seems to be a line every time we go so be prepared. The pizza is super light and tasty. I grew up in Europe and this place takes me right back to Paris.Parking is on the street. Be aware of the times on the signs!

This place is beyond amazing. My husband and I before going to a new restaurant always look it up on yelp. I could not believe all the reviews here so we had to try it. We were both so happy with the service and food and oh my god the dessert l!!!!!. I would give this a 10 star if I could. I think we will have to fly here once a month for this place. PERFECTION!!! Please open a place like this in SF!! We need one here :)
I love the baked Italian creme pasteries at Bottega. I am Itallian and these taste just like gran-ma-ma's !

My boyfriend got me 32 piece pack for our anniversary so i could try every flavors in the house !Loved every flavors except the earl grey, couldn't love that one ! euwh.. But i always love to get macarons or pastries from this shop.
This is the best bakeries I found in Los Angeles. Their cakes are just delicate and tasteful!
thank you I always like Italian bakeries

Everyone has a picture, everyone has a review. This is mine.It's easy to be jaded by hyped this place is so I came in with as much of an open mind as I could muster, and you know what?  This place is good. Really good.  There's no mistake that the hype train took off Waited a tolerable 30 mins on a Sunday around lunchtime and picked up Truffle Pizza,  Despite the rapid turnover, the the  cook's worked in chaotic harmony to make every order consistently just right.There is beauty in simplicity, and these are simply beautiful.
just finished dinner here with my mother and  kids , the best place.
the baked good are off the charts.  love love
Love the desserts and even the food!
Great food and great ambience!

Oh my gosh! A true gem. I was looking for some fancy treats to give a co-worker that was retiring. I picked out a few things and they put it in a cool to go box. It was almost as if it was already wrapped. All i had to do was attach my card and the gift was set. My co worker LOVED the treats. Totally worth every penny.
Love this place. A bit expensive but everything tastes good. Try their cake. So good~
The store has an awesome decoration and the macarons are delicious, I had to take a picture of mine !!
Great atmosphere and food. Highly recommend.

Wow... just wow... not really into these high end places. But the atmosphere was definitely awesome, service was great and the staff always made sure to pay attention to you even on a busy night like when we came in for dinner.
So good.  Amazing macaroons. Loved the coffee.
Heaven in your mouth lol, fresh and the taste is so on point. these guys set the standards for macaroons!

I've been here on several occasions now with great service every time.  Even tonight I went in to pick up some macaroons and I was ask three time if I needed help as I waited for my treats to me boxed up.  And you need to try the lavender macaroon!  Plus they are so cute boxed up and tied with a bow.  The presentation is perfect.
its god price i love   jajaja my family  i like this   god place !!!
Absolutely love everything about this place.Although it can be pretty congested during popular business hoursIts definitely worth the wait. The food is second to none.  An absolute must
Amazing experience! So yummy, so colorful! Everyone should try it! It's a little far but worth going to.
Nice :)
Simply the best in town. My friends and I always go there and I dont have anything bad to say, only good things.I recommend Bottega Louie for sure.
Not even mentioning the fantastic food cause one doesn't really have to, the continuous crowds of people speak volumes. Just love BL!
AMAZING! I LOVE THE MACRONS (Spelling?)Amazing service! Jen is my favorite waitress.
Love this place!! Excellent food, fresh and delicious
The food options are great. Goodies are delicious.
Great Service, great prices, came in sunday and loved everything
I live in downtown Los Angeles for the last seven years and bottega Louie continues to be a cornerstone of downtown Los Angeles food. A must try if you're visiting downtown Los Angeles.
The best ever. I love going to dinner here. amazing food and staff
The Bottega looks so good.  I am ordering them the next time I go in to the store.
Amazing

Having a great experience with this place since May 2016 until now. Service is quick, professional. Not to mention, there is a incredible enthusiastic Location Manager, Eden, always solve problem with a smile, a positive attitude. There is Artemia, Express Agent, and all other to be named that makes always want to come back here any time i visit L.A Thank you for the good service .. Dollar Rent a Car
Probably the best pizza (esp. the tomato sauce) I have ever eaten!
Delicious. Great service! Try the macaroons!
ambiance and service A++

Amazing experience at Bottega Louie! Went for dinner and had a wonderful waiter, who was very helpful in making recommendations, and delicious meal. Ended the night with perfectly made (and packaged!) macarons! Would go back in a heartbeat and recommend to all my friends
Great food, great service. Will be back soon.
Earl Grey macarons are my favorite the boxes are beautiful for gifts
great place, great food,great atmosphere, great service.
The ambiance is AMAZING!!! Very sheek, French design!  The macaroon display when you first walk in looks super cool and is great to take pictures in front of!

Beautiful, airy space, feels like NYC or Europe (though the macarons aren't as good as the ones you get in Paris). Delicious cocktails and food, gorgeous patisserie selection (try the passion fruit meringue tart), and lovely packaging for your takeaway pastries. I like it best for brunch.
This is one of my favorite restaurants. I went here on my b-day then again for brunch.
As sweet as it gets! We always visit this place every time we visit Los Angeles.
beautiful desserts!!
GREAT
the best place for macaroonsif you can handle the traffic its worth it to come and enjoybreakfast are really good we sit together

i like i like i like! Macaroons, white steral environment is actually nice! The wait blows but very good

This place is great. Easy to get to and always open. Great place to get host gifts for parties and when I need to feed by vegan and gluten free friends desert this is where I go. The truffles are good and there is a huge selection.
best macaroons ever! you gotta try them
Great food, atmosphere and service!  You must try the truffle pizza and stay for dessert.
good
I feel in love with this place on the first visit. Great place, and perfect date night.
One of the coolest and best restaurants in LA. The burger there is amazing as well. It was cool that they had a bakery in the restaurant. 10/10 recommend this place
Great Service!   I would recommend this place.

MY FAVORITE MACAROONS IN ALL OF LOS ANGELES !!! SO YUMMY AND ALWAYS FRESH!a friend of mine introduced me to this place a few months ago because they had such good reviews and i decided to try it out myself and my god this place is so awesome ! parking is free first and everything here is just the best
Beautiful, artistic bakery and awesome ambiance!
Awesome!
delicious, our office always buys from bottega and they are gone quick. awesome cookies
This place has always been one of my favorites!!!i can eat their beignets w nutella like freakin tic tacs!!!

great french place. huge hall, friendly stuff
We came here for a ladies day out. We all loved the food. The service was really good and it was clean.
Ur favorite restaurant! Micheal our host is so nice and welcoming! The food is always perfect. We love the bruchettas and the sausage pizza. Taylor our server is the best

As if i was in the middle of Milan! highly recommend!

One of my favorite restaurants in downtown LA! Great service from the waiters and a great atmosphere for a casual date.

Exceptional quality! The food was so good. I ordered the Lobster hash, and noticed they added one Brussels sprout that was filled with flavor. The servers took down my last name, and then walked up to me after 10 minutes, even though there was several people waiting, they remembered who I was. I bought my bed from Ken last year. After price comparing at Sit n Sleep, Mattress Store etc. I learned that I could not get into a Simmons for less than $800 with the exception of  Ken. He did his magic and made it happen. Yay! Being on a beer budget I could not be happier. Recently I went back to Ken to order the Steel bed frame with slats. Home Depot offers the Queen size for $150. Ken offered me his unit that has twice the strength, weight, and steel as HD's model. Since it was  a floor model, Ken's wife knocked the price down from to $300 to $100 . I was so elated. I sent a few of my friends there too. They all gave me 'hi five's' !

I highly recommend CPHAC as I found the staff competent and highly qualified. The experience started with Little Jose who came to inspect and repair my parents furnace. He said he could repair the bad ignition control but due to the age of the furnace and safety concerns he suggested speaking with Doug, System Advisor. Doug came out the next day and left a proposal for us to consider. Very professional and didn't use any pressure to close the deal. After he left I compared pricing with competitors and although CPHAC was not the cheapest I felt confident that they would provide the best service partly because they have been in business since 1963 and I couldn't find any disqualifying reviews. Noel and Jerry came out in a couple of days to install the Carrier furnace within the estimated time frame. They prepped the area where the furnace was to be installed and when finished left their work area spotless.  Supervisor Ross followed up to make sure that we were happy with their service. The answer was yes!

The crab cakes are great for crab cakes but I like the other stuff more. Meatballs were also great for meat balls. Brunch is also good here . Only negative is really how noisy it isakes it hard to have a conversation. But the dining room is so beautiful prices so reasonable, service and food are great so it definitely deserves 5 stars.

Bottega Louie is opening April 6, and a couple of my co-workers and I went for the sneak peek lunch yesterday.  The food was awesome.  We wanted to give the menu a workout, so we ordered the pizza, ravioli, chicken parmigiana, and ribeye steak to share along with some asparagus and green beans on the side.  Everything was cooked to perfection.  The pizza crust was thin and toasty with good flavor and the sausage on the pizza was excellent.  The ravioli was flavorful with spinach and ricotta cheese.  Chicken parmigiana is not my favorite, but this was flavorful and balanced.  The ribeye was great, very flavorful and cooked to perfection.  Joe, our warm and smiling waiter, suggested that we get a chocolate souffle for the table., even though it required a 25 minute wait.  It was worth the wait. It was "molto cioccolato" or very rich with strong dark chocolate flavor.  We had a cup of coffee while we were waiting for the souffle, and the coffee was almost like dessert, it was strong with great coffee flavor.  We thought the prices were fair, a lot of dishes are $14.95, but it is an a la carte menu, so the prices can add up.  What we most loved, though, were the friendly and gracious management and staff.  They made our dining experience special.

I had the most amazing experience at BBMA the Salon this week.  Manuel convinced me to get a Pure Brazilian treatment on my hair.  My hair is thick and frizzy and most of the time it is difficult to handle.  I have dealt with difficult hair all my life and learned in recent years how to hot iron it, but that has led to dry and damaged hair.  It has been 3 days since I got the treatment and my hair is amazing!  Wash and go for the first time in my life.  My hair is soft and straight for the first time ever, I love it!!  My husband loves it too!  Thank you Manuel for encouraging me to get this done and I love my hair cut too!  You are the best thing that has happened to me in a long time, THANK YOU!!

We went here for a breakfast, but the most memorable (and delicious) part of the experience was the time we spent ogling and perusing the beautiful dessert counters and then devouring the ones we picked. Filled with artistic and elegant tarts, mini-cakes, bars, macaroons and even beignets, there is something for every type of sweet tooth. These exquisite treats are a delight for the eyes and your stomach. The coffee was amazing as well.The food /desserts are a bit pricey and portions run on the small size. The atmosphere feels Italian with its posh marble interior and open floor plan which is awesome because they can accommodate large parties and you can see the chefs at work, but it also can get every loud and hard to hear the person next to you. As this place is popular, there may be a bit of wait. Despite all this it is truly worth the trip in for the unforgettable sweets. The desserts also hold really well in taste and stature if you get them to go - we ended up getting a few to take home as some looked too tasty and beautiful to leave there!

I have nothing but good things to say about the high desert camp.  The hardest part of the six week challenge for me was eating the talapagus diet the last week.  So my advice to any new challengers just starting would be to take it serious from the begging so you don't have to do the emergency diet plan!  All in all it was an awesome experience!!  Showed me how much will power and dedication I could have when I set my mind to it.  The owners, trainers and other gym members were all very nice. ;) They helped you along the way.  I am going to stay a member after this challenge because I love it!!

Bottega Louie is absolutely wonderful.  I cannot say enough great things about this place, so I broke it down into a short pro list and then a few of the cons.PROS: Beautiful interior, great pastries, deliciously fresh food, AMAZING customer service, incredible attention to detail (noticed there was a shell from an egg in our dish and without us saying anything they did not charge us for the dish)CONS: Brunch drinks are a little pricey, it can get very loud, limited vegetarian dishes during non-brunch hours.

I went to Dana yesterday for the first time and she was awesome. I'd already gotten a good vibe over the phone when I made my appointment, she offered to come in on her day off to do my hair. I texted her a couple of pictures of myself and the look I want, so she'd know what she's getting into!Dana was ready for me right at my appointment time, which I really appreciate. We talked about my style and color choices in person, and then we went for it. She worked quickly, but my hair still took almost 5 hours to finish! That's what I get for dyeing and bleaching my hair all the time!! She was funny and sweet the whole time.She gave me awesome tips to maintain my hair myself between appointments, and told me to text her anytime if I have questions. I will definitely be back to see her! Thank You

Best food experience I have ever had in DTLA.  Walking into the place I was greeted by professional and happy staff and there was a flurry of activity around the coffee and sweets bar. The atmosphere was fun and the restaurant was immaculate.  Then when we were shown to our table we were immediately waited on by a wonderful server who you could tell loves her job very much.  She made the experience so fun.  The food was stellar--I had the eggs benedict but had avocado instead of ham, and it was the best hollandaise sauce I've had.  The meal concluded with an amazing dessert--a butterscotch bedino.  It tasted like heaven!!  And their vanilla latte was also amazing.

This is my favorite place to eat in downtown LA. It's got marble counter tops at the bar where they expertly make stiff drinks. I always bypass the menu and just get a Hendrick's gin martini. You have to try the fried squash blossoms with cheese, the portabello mushroom fries, and the meatballs. If you order the lasagna, they give you a huge, American portion.
delicious!

ATI Installations for Sears cam today and installed my new dishwasher. Our installer's name was Mark. I thought he was so good, professional and a real big help. I wish I could get him to install everything I ever order from anyone. It was really pleasant and nice. How often does that happen today? Thanks, Mark and ATI Installations.

solid food.  bakery is sublime....in particular, the macaroons, beignets and the creme fracaise are amazing and not to be missed.  The manager is what makes this ship sail so well.  Josh Ruiz was most accomodating to my infant child and harried wife to give us a table where we could have enough space without being in the way.  Love this place and I am a regular because of the food and the service

Cannot say enough about this place if you would open one in Pasadena that would be awesome!!!!! Thank you for the fancy and low key dining experience!

This is a company of great experience,and integrity.We recently experienced  a water leak in our home.KS crew of first responders came out the same day and fixed the problem.Additionally, they did all of the clean up and put me in touch with Craig Bordon of Accet Recovery to negotiate the settlement with the insurance company.The lesson here is to never start with your insurance company.The loss that we would have been paid if we had done this on our own was $ 7,500.00Craig was able to get us over $ 15,000.00 Call Craig he will get you the most from any fire or water damage loss.Craig Bordon 310 864-3015 tell him I said to call.KS Construction thanks for all of your assistance

On Sat June 20 my wife and I went to Advantage Ford in the city of Duarte off the 210 frwy. We spoke to Jorge a sales rep about a new veh. Jorge was patient with us as we drove three different cars on a hot day. With no pressure we sat down and got pricing for the vehicles. On Mon the 22nd we returned and drove another car and made a purchase. Rick the sales mgr was upfront with all the numbers. Joseph in financing explained all of our options clearly. Throughout the process we were never pressured and everyone was very professional. Thank you to our neighbor Michael who works in the service dept for leading us to Advantage Ford. This was our first time at this dealer and recommend them if looking for a car.

GoWireless, 39730 10th St. W, Palmdale, CA 93551, is the place to visit for your  Verizon phone needs.  I was met with smiles and enthusiasm.  Every consultant was motivated to assist.  If one falls short on a specific question, the available team members stepped in answering the question!  No one said, "I don't know" due to laziness or indifference!! I was amazed at how well everyone worked together; especially, when it seems customer service has fallen by the wayside!  In most companies emphases is placed on commission rather than service!The service was outstanding.  I don't mind spending money when the service exist!  It was refreshing to be in an atmosphere where the "Dream Team" focused on service!  I applaud GoWireless and will return!Thank you GoWireless Team!

I can definitely see myself here with a couple of girlfriends, sipping on some cocktails, chatting up a storm, and having some of the best desserts you could imagine. They have a great food menu, too, but food and cocktails are a bit on the pricey side, so if you are in a rush and not looking to spend a ton of money, just stop in for desserts. You will be just as HAPPY, I guarantee it!I had lunch here and took my desserts to go because I had to head out to the airport. I had the Louie salad which had Iceberg lettuce, jumbo shrimp, hearts of palm, avocado, sweet onions, roma tomatoes, bell peppers, cracked pepper & dijon vinaigrette.  I also had an order of the Parmesan portobello fries because it came highly recommended. The salad was very good except I am not a huge  fan of iceberg lettuce because it contains little nutritional value however it was very well made and the hearts of Palm was my favorite part. The Portobello fries were good but a little bit too rich for my liking and it is more of an order for two, but I HAD to try it. I'm actually going to look up a recipe to try and make a baked version of  this at home.

A friend of mine asked me to go out last Sunday to grab a breakfast. We saw this place, which we both thought has a great ambiance. It sure is! It was really a great morning to be greeted by the staff with smiles all over them. The food were presented nicely and very delicious too. All the food was so good. I'll definitely will go back to this place. The service was fast and really great. We couldn't decide at fist what we are going to eat but the waitress helped us decide. She patiently answered all our questions and never lose the smile on her face. She is very polite and very nice. This will definitely be added on our favorite restaurants.

The VERY BEST EXPERIENCE IN CAR BUYING ever!!!!Those stars were earned by Matthew Aharoni, internet salesman and Greg Miller, finance.  I am a bit over the hill, so I have purchased my share of new cars and I always dread the experience, but through the professionalism and non-pressure assistance of these two men, when I purchased my new Hyundai elantra I was SO happy when I left there and SO relaxed!  I also want to tell you that the three hour drive from Santa Maria was oh, so worth it!  They bent over backwards to make my car buying experience as exciting and satisfying as it should be.  On top of all that, I love my new Hyundai!  I went from a being a Ford lady to my wonderful solid new car.  I say "solid" because those doors close nice and heavy like a big car would (BMW I owned) and wow, talk about gas mileage!  When I left there I got 54 mpg, which I haven't seen again, but I get about 49 on trips and about 34 to 32 in town.  It's heaven!  Now, if you are like me and your credit isn't stellar, then things might be "iffy" for you, but you know that going in, like I did, when I walked in.  People with credit messes might get higher percentages on their loans, but that shouldn't reflect on the buying experience at all, which for me it doesn't.  Matthew and Greg did their best for me and I am  so grateful for all their help.  If it can be done, Greg will get it done...   I LOVE my new Hyundai like I never thought I would!  It rides well, solid and true.  I can go 65 without even knowing it.  No whistles, no wobbles....just a solid ride.   The only caveat I have is that you might want to upgrade the radio speakers if you are a real music fan.  I am okay, but they probably need an upgrade.  I got the no frills car, BUT even then I got a back up camera!  Can you believe it?  I didn't want it, but now I love it!  :)   So if you need a new car, go see Matthew and Greg. They are two wonderful professionals who will help you leave there with a beautiful brand new car and feel very relaxed and happy!  You won't spend your whole Saturday at a car dealership in misery, I guarantee that!  Tell them Karen sent you, they'll know who you are talking about!

Rosti Tuscan Kitchen in Santa Monica is our weekly "date night" destiny!  It's been a favorite of ours for many years.  The menu is large and the food is consistently of high quality, well-prepared and just plain YUMMY!  The facility is Tuscan-style open and pleasant - reminiscent of our travels to Italy.  The roasted chicken with two sides is a real pleaser.  Their signature pizzas are a local favorite, which I've had many times, and always notice other diners ordering them as well.  They have a thin crust with a delicious red sauce and several choices of toppings.  Rigatoni with sweet sausage and peppers made our cooking-Italian cousin swoon with delight the first time she tasted it.  There are other choices, too, like salads and panninis.  The prices are within reason and the service is always a delight, which brings me to give a shout-out to Chris, Jeremy, Salvatore, Myra, Anthony, Inga and Morgan!

I cannot say enough praiseworthy about  Bottega Louie!  It is an elegant, charming yet relaxed restaurant that has it all:  fabulous service where you are addressed the way people in a business or service setting should be addressed:  by their last names; exquisite food at prices that, while not cheap, are reasonable and a good value for the type and quality of food that is offered at Bottega Louie.The pastries are phenomenal and the old Brooks Brothers location might make you believe you are dining at a fashionable restaurant in Manhattan. Instead, you'd be dining at a fashionable restaurant in Downtown Los Angeles.

I saw all these positive reviews on yelp and i had to go and try this place it reminded me of my favorite place in the world laduree in Paris France, So i decided to try it one day with my husband our mistake we went on the busiest days of the week Saturday and our wait for 2 people was an hour! i think that was the only negative thing about this restaurant was that. but there is a few pluses while you wait, theres a full bar you can get drinks from and a bakery so you can get macaroons or little cakes while you wait. when we finally got seated we got the mushroom fries which were amazing!!! tomato soup was creamy and delicious. we got cheese pizza which was to die for! and the chocolate souffle  ;-PPP yummy. everything was perfection and the service was fast and i really enjoyed myself. was a little pricey but worth it. and the macaroons are true perfection exactly like laduree my fav. would definitely come back if i lived closer!!!

JMS Air Conditioning and Heating located in Van Nuys, California is fantastic.  We needed a new air conditioning/heater unit.  We called them.  They came over and gave us a very fair quote for a new unit.  They ordered the unit, got the necessary permits and installed the unit within a few days.  They even helped us with the paperwork for the DWP Rebate.  We are very happy with their service and the unit, and would recommend them to everyone.
